entry.title: Blockchain Voluntary Fork (Split) Proposal (Chaofan Li)
entry.summary: In the context, the question about how to handle mining on each chain is raised. It is mentioned that the chain with more mining power will have more value. Additionally, blocks are not mined equally, and one chain will be longer than the other, making it faster and more valuable. The proposal being discussed appears to be a sidechain proposal with the exact same protocol.
